[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. / 2) <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count (max 2)
- At 5+ <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count, gain Coin Power +(highest Reson. / 2) instead (max 2)
[TargetKill] Gain 1 <sprite name="HoldingBreath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HoldingBreath">Глубокий вдох</link></u></color> next turn (2 times per turn)

levelList.name: Рак лёгких
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% more damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color>, consume 10% HP to gain 5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 <sprite name="HoldingBreath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HoldingBreath">Глубокий вдох</link></u></color> next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 2 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +2 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count

levelList.name: Рак лёгких
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% more damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color>, consume 10% HP to gain 5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
<style="highlight">- Gain 1 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> for every ally targeted by this Skill (max 2)</style>

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 2 <sprite name="HoldingBreath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HoldingBreath">Глубокий вдох</link></u></color> next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain <style="highlight">4</style> <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +2 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count
<style="highlight">- Recover half of SP used by this Skill</style>

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">Deal +(<sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Potency + Count)% more damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)</style>

[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color>, consume 10% HP to gain 5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +5 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count

[EndSkill] If target is defeated, gain 3 <sprite name="HoldingBreath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="HoldingBreath">Глубокий вдох</link></u></color> next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 4 <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> and +<style="highlight">4</style> <sprite name="Breath"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Breath">Дыхание</link></u></color> Count
<style="highlight">- Recover SP used by this Skill and regain 1 of each E.G.O resources consumed</style>
